::Whistler::
      "Finally I get to do something."  He runs out side and waits for the enemy to come.  He transforms into robot mode and stands looking pathetic with his entire weaponry of two sets of three small shoulder mounted machine guns.  (Similar to a spider's only weaker and mounted side by side on his shoulders.  They can also be used as claws when in close combat.)
